column5: Heres what 10 Estimize analysts believe FCX will report for Q2 2019 EPS Reporting 0725 BMOestimizecomintrofcxchar

NIO in 2016 the entire world was screaming that FCX was going out of business and the SP plunged from over 2000 to around 450 i bought it around 800 and all the way down my ave came down to about 600 a share and in less than 2 years i sold it for over 1600 there are parallels between these two companies with one MAJOR exception FCX was fighting and continues to fight with the Indonesian government over the Grasberg project the companys primary international development project on the other hand NIO has the Chinese government actively promoting and financially supporting the EV market on top of that the municipal government of Beijing is in the process of investing 10b RMB 144b into NIOFCX was able to survive despite the obstruction and corruption of the Indonesian government How well can NIO do when it actually has the support of the Chinese government instead of having to fight against it
